title: Kasvis-ravintola
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Buffet, Take-out, Finnish
description: Kasvis ravintola is a lunch restaurant situated in the center of Turku in the Adventist church. The all-you-can-eat buffet includes soup. Also each day a vegan lunch is available. Set lunch includes salads, main dish, bread, and tea. You have to take stairs from a corridor, and it also operates a stand on Yliopistonkatu. Previously named Turun Etra Ry.
